description: Facial workouts claim to be able to tone your muscles. Here is how to do them safely and effectively. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: A workout for your face? Say hello to face gyms
title_page: A workout for your face? Say hello to face gyms | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ There is a new fitness routine in town and it does not feature squats or jumping jacks.
Say hello to the face gym.
